data.lyric:
[ti:Downtown's Dead]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:Summer Feelin]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Downtown's Dead - Sam Hunt
[00:09.95]Thanks yeah
[00:11.27]
[00:13.43]Yeah
[00:14.21]The city's so in style
[00:15.50]
[00:17.09]All you see for miles are people
[00:19.38]Spilling in and out of cars
[00:21.60]
[00:22.91]Man I love these bars are making a killin'
[00:25.99]Everywhere I go looks like the place to be
[00:30.35]
[00:31.53]I see people that I know and
[00:34.20]I feel like there's no one here but me
[00:36.42]
[00:37.60]Downtown's dead without you
[00:40.90]
[00:43.54]Girls walk by and friends say hi
[00:45.65]Then Friday night it might
[00:47.20]As well be just another
[00:49.40]Tuesday night without you
[00:52.48]
[00:55.25]As long as you're still in my head
[00:57.23]There ain't a way that
[00:58.51]I can paint a ghost town red
[01:01.04]Downtown's dead downtown's dead
[01:05.71]
[01:09.87]Dancing in the strobes
[01:10.98]
[01:12.66]Out here in the throws of loud house music
[01:15.76]Everything's a blur
[01:16.80]
[01:18.24]I don't hear the words but lips are moving
[01:21.51]Try to get involved
[01:23.08]
[01:24.77]But I've about had enough of people wall to the wall
[01:28.94]
[01:30.64]And I'm just holding it up 'cause
[01:33.22]Downtown's dead without you
[01:36.39]
[01:39.09]Girls walk by and friends say hi
[01:41.29]Then Friday night it might as well be just another
[01:45.02]Tuesday night without you
[01:48.02]
[01:50.77]As long as you're still in my head
[01:52.73]There ain't no way that I can paint a ghost town red
[01:56.67]Downtown's dead downtown's dead
[02:01.22]
[02:11.52]Oh no
[02:12.24]
[02:15.06]Free drinks bright lights what am
[02:18.17]I doing with my life
[02:20.22]
[02:20.84]Okay I quit I've had enough of this
[02:25.57]
[02:26.52]'Cause people are losing their minds
[02:29.56]Can't get you out of my head I'm calling it a night
[02:34.71]
[02:35.48]I'm crawling back to your bed
[02:37.71]Downtown's dead without you
[02:40.86]
[02:43.39]Girls walk by and friends say hi
[02:45.68]Then Friday night it might as well be just another
[02:49.51]Tuesday night without you
[02:52.49]
[02:55.11]As long as you're still in my head
[02:57.55]There ain't a way that I can paint a ghost town red
[03:01.20]Downtown's dead downtown's dead
[03:05.58]
[03:06.67]Oh hoooo
